page.title: 05LIVING IN MICKLEY
page.content:
I live in a 3 bedroom semi-detached house. I have a brother aged 5 and two sisters 3 and 1. My Mammy used to be a Primary School teacher. My Daddy teaches Physics in a High School. I like making models with Lego,reading swimming, jogging and jumping around. I have a BMX bike and a Raleigh Boxer. I like remote controlled cars but I haven't any. We have a colour television but no video or computer. Daddy plays cricket for Stocksfield and sometimes we go to watch. Every Sunday we go to Stocksfield Baptist Church to worship Jesus. On Saturdays we go shopping to Prudhoe and visit Grandma there. She is very kind to us and makes apple pies which I love.
{Christopher Roger Newman Age 7}
